stories.text:
Sites like RussiaToday (RT.com) have become filled with racist, anti-Semitic and misinformation comments - tacitly supporting Russian disinfo interests in the Western media sphere.

When will this change?

https://imgur.com/a/sSOghYC
stories.title: Tech Sanctions: Companies like Disqus should revoke licenses for RT.com
Nvidia confirms it’s investigating an ‘incident,’ reportedly a cyberattack

stories.text:
I always hear very good things about remote work sites such as Turing.com and Toptal.com, and I wonder, are they real? Do people from developing countries really work there for such good salaries?

I know that they are useless for people who live in tech hubs, but for people who live in a place with very few tech jobs are they worthy the time?
stories.title: Ask HN: Turing.com and Toptal. Legit?
Doug Putman has revived unloved brands with a plan to make retail fun again
